::Pyrotaur::
    He went flying past Rainchark spinning, slightly out of control.  
He falls head first into the ground.  Only a few of the shots hit him 
dealing insignifficant damage.  "Ouch."  He pulls himself out of the 
ground.  He looks around, dazed, until he spots Rainchark. He tries 
to use his flame thrower on Rainchark.
